text: Dichloro(1,2-bis(diphenylphosphino)ethane)nickel is a coordination complex with the formula NiCl2(dppe); where dppe is the diphosphine 1,2-bis(diphenylphosphino)ethane. It is used as a reagent and as a catalyst. The compound is a bright orange-red diamagnetic solid. The complex adopts a square planar geometry. It is prepared by combining equimolar portions of nickel(II) chloride hexahydrate with dppe: :Ni(H2O)6Cl2 \+ dppe → NiCl2(dppe) + 6 H2O ==See also== * Dichloro(1,3-bis(diphenylphosphino)propane)nickel ==References== Category:Nickel complexes Category:Phosphine complexes Category:Chloro complexes
title: Dichloro(1,2-bis(diphenylphosphino)ethane)nickel
